member.name: M:Cooperator.Framework.Core.BaseObject.System#ComponentModel#IEditableObject#BeginEdit
member.summary: IEditableObject.BeginEdit implements the OnBeginEdit event call that fires the function delegates in BeginEditEventDelegate
member.remarks: If in the context of a Transaction, then fire the OnBeginEdit with a reference to itself and a new System.EventArgs() like parameters.

member.name: M:Cooperator.Framework.Core.BaseObject.System#ComponentModel#IEditableObject#CancelEdit
member.summary: IEditableObject.CancelEdit implements the OnCancelEdit event call that fires the function delegates in CancelEditEventDelegate
member.remarks: If in the context of a Transaction, then fire the OnCancelEdit with a reference to itself and a new System.EventArgs() like parameters.

member.name: M:Cooperator.Framework.Core.BaseObject.System#ComponentModel#IEditableObject#EndEdit
member.summary: IEditableObject.EndEdit implements the OnEndEdit event call that fires the function delegates in EndEditEventDelegate
member.remarks: If in the context of a Transaction, then fire the OnEndEdit with a reference to itself and a new System.EventArgs() like parameters.

member.summary: This private variable remains true while the constructor is executing, when it finished then become false

member.name: M:Cooperator.Framework.Core.BaseObject.PropertyModified
member.summary: When any property value changes, this method should be invoked.
member.remarks: If the object is initializing (_Initializing is true), no clone it. If is modified for first time ((_state & ObjectState.Modified) != ObjectState.Modified ), sets _OriginalValue and the object as modified
